ICTransactionRequest Struct Reference
Performing Transactions

Transaction request structure in iSMP standalone payment mode. More...

#include <ICAdministration+StandAlone.h>

Data Fields

unsigned short posNumber
 
char amount [8]
 
unsigned char specificField

unsigned char transactionType

char privateData [10]
 
unsigned char delay
 
unsigned char authorization
 

Detailed Description

Transaction request structure in iSMP standalone payment mode.

This is the input data structure for doTransaction. The application should fill all the necessary fields before issuing the transaction request.

Field Documentation

unsigned char accountType 
The kind of payment the POS wishes to use :
AllKinds '0'
Bancaire '1'
AmericanExpress '2'
Aurore '3'
Cetelem '4'
Cofinoga '5'
DinerClub '6'
Pass '7'
Franfinance '8'
JCB '9'
Accord 'A'
Cheque 'C'
Finaref 'F'
Modeus 'M'
Moneo 'O'
PinaultPrintempsRedoute 'P'
Mondex 'X'
char amount[8]

The amount for the transaction (left completed with '0'). If the ISO2 track needs to be read, amount should be '0'

unsigned char authorization 
The authorization that the POS asks the Companion for
Authorization Type 0 '0'
Authorization Type 1 '1'
Authorization Type 2 '2'
char currency[3]

The currency code in ISO4217 format

unsigned char delay

Indicates if the Companion should answer immediately or at the end of the transaction ('0' for immediate answer and '1' for a reported answer)

unsigned short posNumber

The POS number (should be within the range [0 - 255])

char privateData[10]

Application specific data to be passed to payment application

unsigned char specificField

Do not used

unsigned char transactionType 
The type of transaction:
Debit '0'
Credit '1'
Annulation '2'
Duplicata '3'
ISO2 'A'
Specific 'B'
